resources.string: Lake in the USA and Canada, one of the North American Great Lakes. It is located east of Lake Michigan, connected to it by the Mackinac Strait. The volume of water is 3540 km3. From the point of view of hydrography, Michigan and Huron form a single system, but geographically they are considered separate lakes.
Lake in Canada and the USA, the fourth in the Great Lakes system. With an area of 25700 km2, Erie ranks 11th among the lakes of the world and 4th in the USA in this parameter.
A lake in North America. It is located west of the Great Lakes on the border of Canada and the USA. It occupies the 7th place by area among the lakes of the USA.

A massive orange-brown oval-shaped rock formation formed by geological processes about 680 million years ago. It is located in Central Australia - the southernmost administrative region of the Northern Territory, at a point close to the geographical center of the continent.
In the appendix you can get acquainted with the sights of different continents, add them to favorites and see detailed information
